original_title: 美人上司と童貞部下が出張先の相部屋ホテルで…いたずら誘惑を真に受けた部下が10発射精の絶倫性交 天使もえ

Upon arriving at the hotel where she was staying that day, she had booked a shared room for men and women due to a mistake by her subordinates. It turns out that Hashimoto is a virgin when talking while drinking alcohol in the room. Moe is amused and makes a gesture to show her crotch ... Hashimoto pushes down her longing boss and begs for sex! Hashimoto, who has been delusional after seeing her AV, has sexual intercourse until the morning with a hard piston that is left to herself.
tagline: He Took Her Gestures Seriously, And Pumped Her Full Of 10 Cum Shots During A Glorious, Orgasmic Fuck Fest
title: This Beautiful Lady Boss And Her Cherry Boy Employee Ended Up In The Hotel Room During Their Business Trip Together... When She Playfully Started Luring Him To Temptation,
